A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Abomination. Rian Johnson point blank said he likes to make movies that divide the fan base. Well - he succeeded. Terrible plot\, betrayal of classic characters\, and political brow beating can all be found aplenty here if you're into that sort of thing. The only redeeming qualities are Luke imitating the force with a leaf\, and the freaking porgs.
